CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS services ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, price_per_hour DECIMAL NOT NULL CHECK (price_per_hour >= 0), slot TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(32 > LENGTH(slot)), status TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(64 > LENGTH(status)), created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL, updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ, deleted_at TIMESTAMPTZ, service_provider_id BIGINT NOT NULL REFERENCES service_providers(id), UNIQUE (slot, service_provider_id) );
ALTER TABLE services ADD COLUMN search tsvector GENERATED ALWAYS AS (to_tsvector('russian', replace(services.name, 'ั', 'ะต'))) STORED; CREATE INDEX services_search_index ON services USING GIN (search);
